    public class JSONNegFilter
extends JSONDecorator
    Class purpose is to delete chosen fields from Json file

      • JSONNegFilter

        public JSONNegFilter​(JSONComponent comp,
                     java.lang.String f)
        This is a constructor
        Parameters:
        comp - this is a component from decorator pattern, performing different operations on the Json file
        f - this is a string entered as a parameter of HTTP query, containing fields to be deleted

    • Method Detail

      • decorate

        public java.lang.String decorate()
        Override of main decorator pattern function. It passes result of decorate method of comp element from constructor to decorateNeg method
        Specified by:
        decorate in interface JSONComponent
        Overrides:
        decorate in class JSONDecorator

      • decorateNeg

        private java.lang.String decorateNeg​(java.lang.String json)
        This is a method performing filtering of Json file. It transforms file from String to JsonNode and passes it to traverse method
        Parameters:
        json - Json file processed by comp element
        Returns:
        returns filtered JSON

      • traverse

        private void traverse​(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode node)
        This is a method that performs DFS on the Json file tree structure, and deletes fields from fields array
        Parameters:
        node - JsonNode that is currently being analyzed
